00069     void    addMaterialProperties(const btMaterialProperties& mat, PHY_ScalarType triangleType = PHY_INTEGER)
00070     {
00071         m_materials.push_back(mat);
00072         m_materials[m_materials.size()-1].m_triangleType = triangleType;
00073     }
